channel.title: competition on Haojin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in competition on Haojin's Blog

item.title: March Madness!
item.description: Well the true March Madness we lost.

item.title: Spring Unwrap
item.description: We just lost the most important home game today.

item.title: 2021年终总结
item.description: 很多人称这一年为被偷走的一年，于我而言，却意义非凡。是重大的转折，又仿佛是日出时分，朝霞最亮，最广阔，拥有能够扩展整个天空的野心的时刻。

item.title: 随记
item.description: 哇，不知不觉就已经快到期末了。回顾这一学期，真的是经历了非常多的第一次。但或许还不是做总结的时候，就先从这周开始吧。

item.title: 申请季的选择
item.description: 申请季结束了，彻底结束了，终于终于可以松一口气了。

item.title: 小小少年
item.description: 好久没有这么强烈的表达欲了，又想记录些什么。

item.title: Last Spring Festival with Family
item.description: The year of OX, the last Spring Festival I could spend time with family members together.

item.title: World Robot Contest Finals
item.description: This article was revised on March 5

item.title: A short trip to Beijing
item.description: This month is really a busy month.

item.title: Physical Exercises
item.description: On August 28th, I went to a military training base in rural area of my city with my fellow students.

item.title: Chinese Final Exam
item.description: 局促的咨询室里，有升学指导老师、母亲和他，还有从始至终都没有动过的三杯水。

item.title: My first VEX tournament of the season
item.description: Now I am on the bullet train from Xi’an to Baoding, crossing one tunnel after another, passing one bridge after another.

item.title: Our fantastic bridge -- Bridgination
item.description: So, it’s time to prepare for the final exam and enjoy the only moment we have in fundation period.

item.title: My first debate competition
item.description: New challenge I’ve never imagine that one day I can stand on a debate stage and speak in English.

item.title: My article was published in the school newspaper!
item.description: Summary of 2019 VEX Worlds Championship VEX 2019世锦赛总结 难忘的一次经历。

item.title: Summary of 2019 VEX Robotics World Championship
item.description: VEX 2019世锦赛总结 难忘的一次经历。

item.title: A perfect event
item.description: A fantastic and amazing event that I will never forget I was in the front of the lobby hanging our robot with my teammate
